articles.description: The actor, 70, said he gets 'emotional' thinking about how the soap star, who died last week aged 95, saved his daughter's life when she was six years old and they were on holiday in Gibraltar.
articles.content:
June Brown's onscreen EastEnders son John Altman has revealed that he will always feel 'indebted' to her after she saved his daughter Rosanna from drowning.

articles.title: Dizzee Rascal given community order for assaulting ex-fiancee - The Guardian
articles.description: Judge at Croydon magistrates court sentences musician to restraining order and curfew with electronic tag
articles.content:
The musician Dizzee Rascal has been given a community order and will have to wear an electronic tag for attacking his ex-fiancee during a row over child contact and finances.

articles.title: Queen pulls out of Maundy church service - The Guardian
articles.description: Monarch to be represented by Prince Charles and his wife, Camilla Duchess of Cornwall
articles.content:
The Queen has pulled out of the Royal Maundy church service and will be represented by Prince Charles and his wife, Camilla, at the annual event for the first time.
